method.name: Map_Range
method.brief: Map a set of capabilities into a virtual address range.

param.name: start_vaddr
param.description: The start of the virtual address range to map the capabilities to.

param.name: rights
param.description: The rights to assign to each page in the range.

param.name: cap_set
param.description: List of capabilities to map in this invocation. Any combination of page sizes can be used, but the resulting range must not have any holes as a result of alignment issues.

param.name: cap_set_size
param.description: Number of capabilities specified in cap_set

error.name: seL4_AlignmentError
error.description: The is not aligned to the size of the frame set.

error.name: seL4_DeleteFirst
error.description: A mapping already exists in the virtual address range provided

interface.name: seL4_ARM_SMC
interface.cap_description: Capability to allow threads to make Secure Monitor Calls.

method.name: Call
method.brief: Tell the kernel to make the real SMC call.
method.description: Takes x0-x7 as arguments to an SMC call which are defined as a seL4_ARM_SMCContext struct. The kernel makes the SMC call and then returns the results as a new seL4_ARM_SMCContext.

param.name: smc_args
param.description: The structure that has the provided arguments.

param.name: smc_response
param.description: The structure to capture the responses.
